## Welcome to the Department of Methodology & Statistics
- More than 84 experts and experts-to-be
- Research and teaching in statistics, methodology, AI and data science
- Integral role within the School of Social and Behavioral Sciences.
- Collaboration with departments like psychology, sociology, and educational sciences.
- Strong collaborative ties with governmental and non-governmental organizations and industry.
  - e.g., TNO, CBS, RIVM, WODC, Banks, Zeiss optics and the Dutch Ministry of Justice and Security.


## AI and Data Science Expertise
- Expertise in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science.
- Key research examples:
  - Natural language processing 
  - Dark Data and Synthetic Data 
  - Computational evaluation of algorithmic solutions
  - Networks and Relational Event History modeling 
  - Analyzing complex data structures
  - Causal Inference in many flavors

## Conclusion
- We are a group of experts in Statistics, AI and Data Science
- We are capable of much more than you are currently *using* us for
- We are always open for collaborations
- Consult us when you start new projects on new topics
- Tell your team to contact us when they need help with data analysis, AI or machine learning
- We are available to collaborate on grant proposals, research and innovation projects
